title: Michigan Football Apologizes For Letting QB With A Concussion Play
teaser: Students at the University of Michigan want the coach and the athletic director to be fired. Both faced protests after the quarterback was put back in a game following a head injury last week. The mistakes made during the game are the latest in a series of missteps by the university.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
